paragraphs: =D. Eugenio de Zúñiga y Ponce de León=, _npr. m._, =26=, 9, _note_.
=excitar=, _v. a._, to excite; =62=, 11, to animate, to stir up.
=explicar=, _v. a._, to explain; =--se=, _v. refl._, to understand, to account for, =121=, 17; to explain oneself, =111=, 17, =114=, 10.
=exponer=, _v. a._, to expose; to explain, to expound, =43=, 3, =98=, 22; =--se=, _v. refl._, to expose, to expose oneself, =36=, 23, =36=,
